result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua Scott Onstad

records.addlTxt: Status Conference on December 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.

3:51 PM Defendant Joshua Scott Onstad appeared by phone.  Attorney Lucas Swank appeared by video for Joshua Scott Onstad.  Prosecuting attorney Micabil Diaz-Martinez appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defense advised that the state is still waiting for lab results, should have them in November. State agrees with statements made by defense. STC set. Bond cont.
Status Conference scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status Conference on October 20, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

1:09 PM Defendant Joshua Scott Onstad appeared by phone.  Attorney Lucas Swank in court for Joshua Scott Onstad.  Prosecuting attorney John Harrison Sacia in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense advised state was waiting on blood results, does not know state's position currently. State advised has court trial set in OWI 1st offense, pending 2nd OWI 1st from City of Arcadia. State wishes to resolve all cases together. State requests to set STC to allow time for lab results. STC set. Bond cont.
Status Conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Status Conference on August 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Prosecuting attorney Micabil Diaz-Martinez appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua Scott Onstad appeared by phone.  Attorney Lucas Swank appeared by video for Joshua Scott Onstad. State advised possible resolution. Defense advised 2 pending OWI 1st, case was reset due to waiting for blood results. State requests additional status to allow for possible global resolution. STC set for 08-19-2022 at 1:00 p.m. Bond cont.
Status Conference on July 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.

State requests additional status to allow for possible global resolution. STC set. Bond cont.
Status Conference scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Do not possess or consume alcohol; donot enter any place where alcohol is sold for consumption on premises. Defendant not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Defendant to have no contact with Z.M.

11:40 AM Prosecuting attorney Micabil Diaz-Martinez appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua Scott Onstad appeared by phone.  Attorney Lucas Swank appeared by video for Joshua Scott Onstad. Court advised defendant of rights/max penalties. Defendant waives reading of complaint and enters NG pleas. VWC advises victim Z.M. wishes to have NC added. Court grants. PTC/STC set. SIBA.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
